definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Fukushima Prefecture and the Japan Meteorological Agency has issued a tsunami warning, Ibaraki Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 日本氣象廳已向福島縣以及茨城縣發佈海嘯警報。

sentences.english: And yesterday, the Meteorological Agency announced that the rainy season ended.
sentences.chinese: 跟住星期三，氣象廳宣佈了梅雨結束了。

sentences.english: After the earthquake, the Japan Meteorological Agency issued tsunami warnings the first time.
sentences.chinese: 日本氣象廳在地震發生後第一時間發佈海嘯警報。

sentences.english: According to Busan Regional Meteorological Agency statistics, this is the lowest in 96 years.
sentences.chinese: 據釜山地方氣象廳統計，這是96年來最低。

sentences.english: Japan Meteorological Agency has released the devastating tsunami warning.
sentences.chinese: 日本氣象廳已發佈破壞性海嘯預警。

sentences.english: Japan Meteorological Agency called on local residents concerned about the new fuel Yue volcanic activity.
sentences.chinese: 日本氣象廳呼籲當地居民關注新燃嶽火山的活動情況。

sentences.english: The drought as well as the water shortage will continue for some time, according to the South Korea Meteorological Department.
sentences.chinese: 韓氣象廳預計，乾旱及缺水問題將持續一段時間。

sentences.english: The satellite imagery is provided by JMA.
sentences.chinese: 該衛星影像是由日本氣象廳提供的。

sentences.english: Japan Meteorological Agency said the earthquake that triggered the tsunami risk.
sentences.chinese: 日本氣象廳說，這次地震並沒有引發海嘯的危險。

sentences.english: It also reported a smaller aftershock shortly after.
sentences.chinese: 氣象廳還報告了不久之後的一場小規模餘震。
